short_summary: Provide a floor scrubber to the Department of National Defence (DND).
description: Canada is seeking offers to provide a floor scrubber to The Department of National Defense (DND).
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Announcement Information

* **Reference Number:** WS4312903993-Doc4343090318
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4312903993
* **Publication Date:** December 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 17, 2024, 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Date:** January 15, 2024
* **Tender Status:** Cancelled

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Supply Code:** *47121603 (Floor polishers)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** *Nova Scotia
* **End User Entities:** Department of National Defence (DND)

### Contractor Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:**
	+ 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Genevieve Petten, (elle-la / she-her)
	+ genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Request for Proposal

Canada is seeking offers to provide a floor scrubber to the Department of National Defence (DND). Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. The full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into the SAP Ariba account and the Government of Canada profile is complete.

### Access to Tender Documents

The Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded through the SAP Ariba account. Please ensure to log in and complete the Government of Canada profile for access. [Link to tender documents](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18229950?extsite=MTgyMjk5NTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) 

Please note that all bidder requirements and other information can be found in the solicitation document. If you have any questions or concerns,
